content: Yes, the artwork for Tame Impala's "Currents" album is indeed visually striking and psychedelic. It features a bright, swirling, colorful design that reflects the album's psychedelic and experimental sound. It was created by Australian artist Robert Beatty, who has also worked on album artwork for other notable artists such as The Flaming Lips and Neon Indian. The artwork for "Currents" has been highly praised and contributed to the album's overall success and acclaim.
